question: For which of the following reasons Calcium ammonium nitrate (CAN) is considered as a popular nitrogen fertilizer?
option1: It fixes the nitrogen in the soil
option2: It is slow supplier of nitrogen
option3: It is capable of making the soil acidic
option4: It is having more percentage of nitrogen in it
answer: It is slow supplier of nitrogen
explanation: Calcium Ammonium Nitrate (CAN) fertilizer can be safely applied to acid soils. Its total nitrogen content varies from 25 to 28% (Half of this total nitrogen is in the ammonical form and rest half is in nitrate form).
